summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAv√®ne's Retrinal 0.1 Intensive Multi-Corrective Cream is a potent lightweight cream that visibly reduces the appearance of deep wrinkles while smoothing and renewing the appearance of skin. Formulated with 0.1% Retinaldehyde for a youthful, radiant complexion with little to no discomfort.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly smooths and reduces the appearance of fine lines & deep wrinkles and furrowsSkin appears plump and firm with even skin tone with enhanced brightnessFormulated with physician-strength Retinaldehyde, clinically proven to be more effect than Retinol97% Ingredients of Natural OriginKey IngredientsRETINALDEHYDE: Clinically shown to be more effective than Retinol*, smoothes appearance of wrinkles and brightens skin. *Edwards. Topical Retinol and Retinaldehyde in cosmetics as alternatives to Retinoic Acid evidence of efficacy. Retinoids 2001; Volume 17 Number 4.‚ÄãHYALURONIC ACID: Combination of pure and complementary HA, helps enhance skin hydration and elasticity.AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER: Clinically shown by 150+ studies to soothe, soften and calm the skinFormulated WithoutFragranceSoapParabensSulfateAlcoholSiliconeSilicaAluminumSoyWheatDairyTalcItem 2635166How To UseApply in evening to the face, neck and d√©collet√©. Can be used after 7 days post-superficial aesthetic procedure or once skin has re-epithelialized.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid exposure to the sun and use sunscreen protection. If you experience discomfort, apply less frequently. Avoid contact with eyes and eye area. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Do not use if pregnant or breastfeeding. Keep out of reach of children. Do not expose the product to temperatures above 104 degrees F.IngredientsAvene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Squalane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter (Butyrospermum Parkii Butter), Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil (Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil), Pentaerythrityl Tetracaprylate/Tetracaprate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behenyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, C20-22 Alkyl Phosphate, C20-22 Alcohols, Acacia Senegal Gum, Adenosine, Cetearyl Glucoside, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil), Red 33 (Ci 17200), Retinal, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Terminalia Chebula Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum.
how_to_use: Apply in evening to the face, neck and d√©collet√©. Can be used after 7 days post-superficial aesthetic procedure or once skin has re-epithelialized.Precautions: For external use only. Avoid exposure to the sun and use sunscreen protection. If you experience discomfort, apply less frequently. Avoid contact with eyes and eye area. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. Do not use if pregnant or breastfeeding. Keep out of reach of children. Do not expose the product to temperatures above 104 degrees F.
ingredients: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil (Carthamus Tinctorius Seed Oil)

reviews.headline: Ah NO
reviews.comments: I purchased it based on the reviews-must be fake ones. I used it for a month per direction- no changes nothing.. costly and does not work

reviews.headline: Wow it's like a chemical peel at home!
reviews.comments: This stuff is legit üëå. It really works. Don't use it everyday because its super strong. I use it like every 3 days.

reviews.headline: It's the best eye cream I ever had
reviews.comments: I got it to help me with the puffiness on my eyes and dark circles. The skin around my eyes looks way healthier and the dark circles are definitely smoother

reviews.headline: I would buy this for temporary wrinkle fix
reviews.comments: Texture is soft not hard at all. Color is tan but goes on clear. Make sure to apply sunscreen when heading out.

reviews.headline: Good Retinol For The Price
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I think this is a good retinol at the price point. Similar products are $75-150 so I think this is a great option. I started a couple times a week and added as my skin adjusted. I didn't find the smell or the texture off putting. I liked the pump to keep the retinol from degrading. I did not have excessive redness or appealing, but I did notice a slight improvement in skin texture while using the product.

reviews.headline: Gentle, no retinol uglies
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I don't often like retinol products. This is pretty gentle and I can see that my dry skin has increased smoothness. I also like to use this on the back of hands and forearms. Follow with sunscreen.

reviews.headline: Not a plan product, but is pricey
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Not a bad product but not the quick fix miracle cream that they make it out to be. I did notice a slight plumping effect to my skin but nothing noticeable by others. Retinol is a long term ingredient so without years of continued use I can't say how well it performs. I like the pump bottle as it keeps air out to keep the product lasting longer, but I fear there will be product left in the bottle at the end that I won't be able to get out. I don't think I would purchase this product.

reviews.headline: My Skin's New BFF
reviews.comments: Amazing Product & My Skin's New BFF!! I've done this review 6 times now & I'm HOPING this is the last time! I've sent emails, videos, pics & even screenshots with NO REPLY!! I LOVE THIS PRODUCT BUT THIS REVIEW HAS BEEN A NIGHTMARE!! Great product but ULTA REVIEW PROCESS NEEDS WORK!!

reviews.headline: Good entry-level retinol at a reasonable price
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I think this is a good retinol at the price point. Similar products are $75-150 so I think this is a great option. I started a couple times a week and added as my skin adjusted. I didn't find the smell or the texture off putting. I liked the pump to keep the retinol from degrading. I did not have excessive redness or appealing, but I did notice a slight improvement in skin texture while using the product.

reviews.headline: I loved the feel of this product!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really liked this product. It had a nice smooth feel to it. There was not a strong smell to it. The main ingredient is retrinal. It is a corrective cream used to help with multiple skin concerns.

reviews.headline: Good but pricey
reviews.comments: Smells like the prescription retinol I get so I'm assuming it's good quality. Nice bottle size and pump. I got this in exchange for my honest review and I think it's good but you can get similar products for a lot less money.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is in wonderful mess free packaging. This is a very gentle formula that doesn't cause irritation on my sensitive skin. This moisturizes and works great at diminishing fine lines. It smells like sunscreen which I like.

reviews.headline: No Irritation, Just Results
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been using the Av√®ne RetrinAL Intensive Multi-Corrective Cream for a few weeks now, and I'm really impressed. I have sensitive skin, so I've always been nervous about using retinol products, but this one is super gentle. No redness, no irritation‚Äîjust smooth, hydrated skin.

It has a nice, creamy texture that feels rich but absorbs quickly. My skin feels softer, looks more even, and I've noticed some fine lines around my eyes and mouth starting to fade. I also love that it's fragrance-free and doesn't make me break out.

If you have sensitive or dry skin and want something that works without being harsh, this is definitely worth trying.

reviews.headline: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review]
reviews.comments: I love this product. I used it every evening before bed. It has a nice creamy texture and goes on smoothly. It corrects the appearance of wrinkles, firmness, and radiance. The number one ingredient is retrinal. I would definitely recommend this product!!

reviews.headline: I will incorporate this double serum into my routine.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This cream is amazing. It helped my skin tone and my fine lines and wrinkles. It is a silky texture that makes your face soft and hydrated. I give it a 7 out of 10 only because the bottle pump quit working and I had to open it and i lost a lot of product. If they improve the quality of the bottle and pump then it would be a 10.

reviews.headline: It's pretty good
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have been using this for over a month now. I can't say I see significant changes in my skin, but it does absorb pretty quickly. I have fairly sensitive skin so I don't use it every day but every few days instead. It does cause some peeling but nothing crazy.

reviews.headline: A retinol product that doesn't cause irritation!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] So I have to say that I didn't notice any major improvement in my skin after using this product but it also didn't irritate my skin like some retinol products do.  I was able to use it everyday with no redness or burning. It absorbs quickly into your skin.  The pump makes it easy to apply and it has no scent at all.  I'm still using it and hoping it just takes more time to see visible results. I haven't given up yet.

reviews.headline: My Skin's New BFF
reviews.comments:
I received this product in exchange for my honest review & A HUUUUUGE Thanx to Infl and AveneUSA for this AMAZING, Complimentary, Free for Review, Full Size Bottle of Av√®ne's Retrinal 0.1 Intensive Multi-Corrective Cream.
It's mainly for Fine Lines and Wrinkles. I'm on day Three and am IN LOOOOOOOVE with the Cream. It's Light Weight, Scentless and ACTUALLY WORKS!! I'm 51 and this felt AMAZING on my Face, Neck and Hands!! A PERFECT non Filter, Filter!! An ABSOLUTE WIN on this Cream!!

It's mainly for Fine Lines & Wrinkles. I'm on day Three & am IN LOOOOOOOVE with the Cream. It's Light Weight, Scentless & ACTUALLY WORKS!! I'm 51 & this felt AMAZING on my Face, Neck & Hands!! A PERFECT non "Filter, Filter"!! An ABSOLUTE WIN on this Cream!!

reviews.headline: Miracle cream for sensitive skin!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have super sensitive skin being a natural redhead and most products cause me issues but this has been a miracle cream for me. Its fragrance free and doesn't break me out in any way. All I see if amazing results leaving my skin better with each use. You will not be disappointed in this.

media.headline: Brighten, tighten, wrinkle fighting
media.caption: The perfect pea-sized amount every time.

faceoff_positive.comments:
Okay, so let's talk about this little tube of magic because it deserves some attention. And full disclosure, I was gifted this in exchange for my honest thoughts.

Pros‚ÄîFirst off, it's way gentler than I expected for something that claims to be 3X stronger than retinol. Usually, with stronger vitamin A products, you brace yourself for peeling, flaking, and irritation, but nope‚Äîthis one plays nice. It's lightweight, melts right into the skin, and doesn't leave a greasy or sticky feel. I love that it gives me real results without the drama‚Äîmy skin looks brighter, smoother, and just fresher in the morning. Fine lines? Definitely softer. Plus, my complexion has this glow that I swear makes me look like I actually get eight hours of sleep (spoiler: I don't). And let's not forget that Av√®ne is all about that French pharmacy, sensitive-skin-friendly magic, so the formula has soothing ingredients that help balance things out. It's also a great addition to a skin cycling routine since it delivers potent results without overwhelming the skin.

Cons‚ÄîOkay, so even though it's gentler, it's still retinaldehyde, which means you need to work up to it. If you go in full force every night from the jump, your skin will get mad at you. Also, it's not cheap, and for the price, I kind of wish it came in a slightly bigger tube because I know I'm going to repurchase it. And one minor thing‚Äîthe packaging is an opaque squeeze tube (great for keeping the formula stable), but I wish it had an airless pump to make dispensing easier.

Final thoughts? This is hands down one of the best retinal products if you want to level up from retinol but aren't ready for an RX. It gives serious anti-aging benefits without making your skin freak out. Pricey? Yes. Worth it? Absolutely.
faceoff_positive.headline: Brighten, tighten, wrinkle fighting

faceoff_negative.comments: I heard a lot about the benefits of retinaldehyde (retinal) which is stronger than an over-the-counter retinol, but a gentler alternative to prescription tretinoin (retinoic acid). I have experience with both so I was excited to get a chance to try the Retrinal 0.1% Intensive Multi-Corrective Cream from Av√®ne.  Formulated with 0.1% Retinaldehyde it's listed as 3X more powerful than retinol. If you've been using retinol and are looking to take the next step up in potency, this would be a good one to try. Or if you're finding prescription tretinoin to be too strong or irritating, this would be a good one to try or to alternate with until you build to tolerance.  The cream blends well and has no noticeable scent, which I like, and I haven't experienced any irritation at all while using it. Visually I'm not a fan of its yellow color as it looks like it's gone bad or oxidized. So while I wish it were more cosmetically elegant, in the end its efficacy is what really matters. For me, I find this works best for use on my neck area which is usually too sensitive for prescription tretinoin. As for everyone else, choosing between them depends on your skin's tolerance and goals. Retinol is great for beginners, retinaldehyde for intermediate users, and tretinoin for those needing maximum efficacy.
faceoff_negative.headline: The Goldilocks of Vitamin A
